Weymouth_Town.Jackrabbit Design: Jackrabbit Design is a Boston-based, strategic graphic design firm which was founded in 1999 by business partners, David Belyea and Sharon Mulcahy. Jackrabbit is a private firm dealing in visual communication and brand development. Since 1999, Jackrabbit has created product identifications and branding, collateral design, print and online advertisements, one-on-one marketing design, website development, promotional programs, graphic invitations, and package design.
